thread.title: Peter Wilde
thread.title_full: Bella Barista - For Coffee Lovers reviewed by Peter Wilde

author: Peter Wilde
title: Peter Wilde
text: I am so happy that I accidentally found Bella Barista whilst looking for another business. The result is being able to get coffee beans that are freshly lightly roasted to a consistent level that is absolute perfection. Soft flavoured full and rounded with both citrus and toasted almond notes.I doubt that coffee ten times the cost would or could be better. These people really know what good coffee should taste like. WELL DONE BELLA BARISTA !
